Address.value: 111 SUTTER STREET SUITE 1300, SAN FRANCISCO, California, 94104, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Augmedix Inc humanizes the clinician-patient experience by enabling clinicians to focus on what matters most, delivering high-quality patient care. The company is a provider of medical documentation and data services intended to help clinicians and patients form a human connection at the point of care without the intrusion of technology. It converts natural clinician-patient conversations into medical documentation and provides real-time administrative support. Augmedix focuses on saving clinicians 3 hours per day, increase in patient satisfaction by around 35%, and increasing clinician's satisfaction with a work-life balance by over 40%.
